DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the distribution of a microbicidal gel in the vagina and confirm the presence of bare spots. MRIs will be done with and without the addition of the MRI contrast Gadolinium to the microbicide in order to determine whether the bare spots are an artifact of the MRI technique.
DOC.brief_title: An Imaging Trial of the Distribution of Topical Gel in the Human Vagina: Assessment of Bare Spots
DOC.criteria: 18 45 year old women normal Pap smear not pregnant abnormal pelvic exam history of claustrophobia allergy to product formulation pregnant or breastfeeding
